named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_FIND_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.key = ?1

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_FIND_BY_NAME_USAGE
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.name = ?1 AND a.attributeUsageIdInternal = ?2

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_FIND_BY_USAGE
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.attributeUsageIdInternal = ?1 ORDER BY a.required DESC, a.uidPk

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_FIND_BY_EXCLUDE_USAGE
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.attributeUsageIdInternal <> ?1 ORDER BY a.required DESC, a.uidPk

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE_PRODUCT_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a.attribute.uidPk FROM ProductTypeImpl p INNER JOIN p.productAttributeGroupAttributes a

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE_CATEGORY_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a.attribute.uidPk FROM CategoryTypeImpl c INNER JOIN c.categoryAttributeGroupAttributes a

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE_PRODUCT_TYPE_SKU
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT a.attribute.uidPk FROM ProductTypeImpl p INNER JOIN p.skuAttributeGroupAttributes a

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE_CUSTOMER_PROFILE_TYPE
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT att.uidPk FROM CustomerProfileValueImpl cp INNER JOIN cp.attribute att

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_SELECT_CATALOG_OR_GLOBAL_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.catalog.uidPk = ?1 OR a.global = TRUE ORDER BY a.key

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_SELECT_CATALOG_OR_GLOBAL_BY_USAGE
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.catalog.uidPk = ?1 OR (a.global = TRUE AND a.attributeUsageIdInternal IN (:list))

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_FIND_BY_CATALOG_USAGE
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE (a.catalog.uidPk = ?1 OR a.global = TRUE) AND a.attributeUsageIdInternal = ?2 ORDER BY a.required DESC, a.uidPk

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_SELECT_GLOBAL_ALL
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.global = TRUE

named-query.name: ATTRIBUTE_NAME_BY_KEY
named-query.query: SELECT a.name FROM AttributeImpl a WHERE a.key = ?1

named-query.name: SKU_ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT sav.uidPk FROM SkuAttributeValueImpl sav LEFT OUTER JOIN sav.attribute sa WHERE sa.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT cav.uidPk FROM CategoryAttributeValueImpl cav LEFT OUTER JOIN cav.attribute ca WHERE ca.uidPk=?1

named-query.name: PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT pav.uidPk FROM ProductAttributeValueImpl pav LEFT OUTER JOIN pav.attribute pa WHERE pa.uidPk=?1

named-query.name: CUSTOMER_ATTRIBUTE_IN_USE
named-query.query: SELECT cav.uidPk FROM CustomerProfileValueImpl cav LEFT OUTER JOIN cav.attribute ca WHERE ca.uidPk=?1
